function.name: fn_ValidateCA_PasswordMask
function.description: fn_ValidateCA_PasswordMask - Function to validate the Password field masking functionality in Create Account page

parameter.value: Function's XML file name: fn_CreateAccount.xml

parameter.name: Clear the text box and enter

step.name: Screenshot - Password field value is masked by default

parameter.value: By default - 'Password' field value is displayed as masked

step.name: Screenshot - Password field value is not masked by default

parameter.value: By default - 'Password' field value is not masked
'Eye icon' on password field is available and clicked on Login page

step.name: Screenshot - Password field value is unmasked

parameter.value: 'Password' field value is unmasked as expected

step.name: Screenshot - Password field value is not unmasked

parameter.value: 'Password' field value is not unmasked
'Eye icon' on password field is available and clicked on Login page

step.name: Screenshot - Password field value is masked

parameter.value: 'Password' field value is masked again as expected after clicking Eye icon

step.name: Screenshot - Password field value is not masked

parameter.value: 'Password' field value is not masked as expected
